purpose: To showcase the tangible impacts created by the CEP proof of concept at First Interstate.
title: CEP Proof of Concept Impact
reasoning_strategy: Present outcomes in a structured format to emphasize success across different areas.

tables.title: Impact Details
tables.description: Specific outcomes from the CEP proof of concept.

cells: Profitable growth through better insight into and management of the value of customers – deeper and longer-lasting relationships resulting in an anticipated 4.8% retail and 10% commercial net income gain over baseline performance
Over $1.4M in revenue for a scalable, repeatable Advisors Client Experience offering
Foundational for other Advisors opportunities (e.g., client lifecycle management, conversion support, big data)
Created a pipeline of 11 Client Experience consultants ready to execute Client Experience engagements
Revived and expanded Mastercard’s relationship with First Interstate Bank at the executive level
$650M GDV added through expected incremental growth
